articles.description: The actor, 42, portrayed Alfie Solomons in the hit BBC show for Steven Knight, and is teaming up with him once more as executive producer for the six-part drama, it was revealed on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Tom Hardy is set to reunite with the creator of Peaky Blinders for a new adaptation of Great Expectations, it was revealed by the BBC on Wednesday.

articles.title: Joy Division members to celebrate the life of Ian Curtis on 40th anniversary of his death - NME.com
articles.description: Joy Division's Bernard Sumner and Stephen Morris will take part in an online event next week to celebrate the life of the late Ian Curtis
articles.content:
Joy Division members Bernard Sumner and Stephen Morris will take part in an online event next week to celebrate the life of the late Ian Curtis 40 years on from his death.
The band’s frontman and lyricist took his own life on May 18, 1980 at the age of 23.

articles.description: James McAvoy, Taron Egerton and Andy Serkis are all on board for Audible's The Sandman audiobook. Read more at Empire.

articles.title: Tekashi 6ix9ine: Rapper has $200,000 donation rejected by No Kid Hungry charity - Sky News
articles.description: No Kid Hungry has said it has a policy to decline funding from donors "whose activities do not align with our mission and values".
